subject: College Athletics
Football
Colleges and Universities
Amateur Athletics
lead_paragraph: There is no such thing as donor rejection when it comes to an industrialized amateur culture where coaches are treated to the same inside-the-velvet-ropes lifestyle of N.F.L. messiahs.
